Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to flags sold in the state of New York
Summary: Requires any American flag and New York state flag sold in New York state to be manufactured in the United States.
LawCode: Add ยง396-hhh, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring all flags sold in the state of New York be one hundred percent manufactured in the United States
